name: camera
description: Device to capture images or videos

name: insect trap
description: A device used to capture insects for study or control.

name: cutting tool
description: A tool used to cut materials, such as scissors, scalpels or knives.

name: wrapper
description: Something used to wrap or package items, such as plastic wrap, foil or paper.

name: precise manipulation tool
description: A tool designed for precise manipulation of small objects, such as tweezers or forceps.

name: breaking beads
description: Beads employed to facilitate the breaking of a material.

name: gloves
description: Protective coverings for hands, often made of latex or nitrile.

name: hand cleaning agent
description: A chemical agent, often ethanol, used to avoid contamination among samples.

name: paper towels
description: Absorbent paper used for drying hands or cleaning surfaces.
